titles.title: To allow binding arbitration clauses to be included in all contracts affecting the land within the Gila River Indian Community Reservation.
To allow binding arbitration clauses to be included in all contracts affecting the land within the Gila River Indian Community Reservation.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

bill.summary: Amends specified Federal law to allow binding arbitration clauses to be included in all contracts, including leases (as under current law), affecting the land within the Gila River Indian Community Reservation.
